CutSceneText.Text: Once you get inside the Lepharist laboratory, be sure to destroy all the equipment you can.
Without that, they won't be able to carry out their cruel experiments.
In the deepest part of the laboratory, in Ormenon's Room, is the creature they call
RM-78c. You have to kill it.
if it lives, all of Elysea is at risk.
Oh, and...don't come back without those research records.
